name: openwhyd
full_description:
# Openwhyd

ðŸ’Ž Discover, collect and play music from Youtube, Soundcloud, Bandcamp, Deezer and other streaming platforms

Openwhyd is:
- an independent music curation service freely available at openwhyd.org;
- a community of music lovers who enjoy taking their time to find the best tracks and videos for their collection;
- a collaborative / open-source project maintained by passionate volunteers. You too can contribute!

Initially known as whyd.com, the development of this product started in 2012, and was lead by Adrien Joly. It became open-source in 2016. Read the full story from Whyd to Openwhyd.

## Tech stack

- Node.js + Express + MongoDB
- HTML + CSS + jQuery
- PlayemJS for streaming tracks continuously

Source code available at https://github.com/openwhyd/openwhyd

## Usage

```sh
$ curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openwhyd/openwhyd/master/docker-compose-deploy.yml >docker-compose.yml
$ docker-compose up --detach
$ open http://localhost:8080
$ docker-compose down
```

Read https://github.com/openwhyd/openwhyd/blob/master/docs/INSTALL.md for more information.
